title: Standing waves - 4-antinode string - freq from v L

content.question: The figure shows a standing wave on a string that is fixed at both ends. The stringâ€™s length is <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>, and the propagation speed of waves on the string is <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>. What is the frequency of the standing wave?

choices.label: <math alttext="one fourth times the fraction v over L, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction v over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="2 times the fraction v over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="4 times the fraction v over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 times the fraction v over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mfrac><mi>v</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
